resources.string: Chidiya Udd is a very simple and an old Indian childhood game. The basic concept is that you have to identify the property of the object coming on the screen, whether it flies or it doesn’t.

Some objects like pigeon, sparrow, kite, balloon etc fly, while others like dog, cat, lion, TV, comb doesn’t fly. There will be object and characters coming and going on the game screen, you have to identify the object property and then press the “Fly” or “Don’t Fly” button accordingly. Correct guess will give you points; incorrect guess will give 0 points. In each level, you must identify at least 15 out of 20 images correctly, in order to go to the next level.
Game has two difficulty levels: Easy and Hard

In Easy Level, the game play will be normal and the buttons will be fixed, while in Hard Level, there will be slight change in the way buttons come in game, sometimes fly button will be in left, sometimes it will be in right. So you have to concentrate more during the game in hard level.
This is all about the basics of the game, Happy Playing

You will get 3 seconds time for each image to shuffle and if you press correct (for example fly button for something which flies) then you will get 100 points and the next image will be called, and if you presses wrong button, then there would be 0 points and the next image will be called. Even if you don’t press any button in 3 seconds, 0 points will be given and next image will be called. There would be total of 20 random images from the whole collection of images in this level, and you must at least identify 15 images to unlock the next level, otherwise there will be game over.

You will get 2 seconds time for each image to shuffle and if you press correct (for example fly button for something which flies) then you will get 100 points and the next image will be called, and if you presses wrong button, then there would be 0 points and the next image will be called. Even if you don’t press any button in 2 seconds, 0 points will be given and next image will be called. There would be total of 20 random images from the whole collection of images in this level, and you must at least identify 15 images to unlock the next level, otherwise there will be game over.

There would be two images shuffling at a time, with 2 seconds (hereafter on all levels), and on one image there would always be an arrow, can be on left image or right image randomly, you have to press the correct button for the image with arrow. Correct gets 100 points and incorrect gets 0 points, minimum 15 out of 20 images to be identified correctly for unlocking into the next level
